module.name: Asterisk REST Interface Users
module.changelog: *13.0.4* Comment and add function to find by username *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9619 Adding user with Asterisk Rest Interface users does not prompt for system reload *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha2* Visual Styling Fixes *12.0.2* FREEPBX-7793 Add Password generator to the ARI *12.0.1* FREEPBX-7792 Add option to DELETE users *12.0.0* Initial Release
module.description: Asterisk 12 introduces the Asterisk REST Interface (ARI), a set of RESTful API's for building Asterisk based applications. This module provides the ability to add and remove ARI users.
